title: SECR Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Honorary Visiting Specialist Posts
description: The South East Central Railway (SECR) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02Â Honorary Visiting Specialist Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation and PGDM can apply for the SECR Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process...
